Page 1599
From: Hugh Hurwitz (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @gmail.com>
Subject: draft
Sent: Sun, 11 Aug 2019 21:46:30 -0400
To: Hurwitz Hugh (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) bop.gov>
(b)(8);
(b)(7)(C) as discussed, several options are below. Please note that we need to discuss timing of all this. I will need to let my Executive Staff know so they are not taken off guard as they will no doubt get a lot of questions from their staff and other wardens. Also note that the Warden just called Ray and told him the US Attorney is meeting with him at 10 am tomorrow. So this probably should be some time after that interview.
(b)(5)

I will need to let my Executive Staff know so they are not taken off guard as they will no doubt get a lot of questions from their staff and other wardens. Also note that the Warden just called Ray and told him the US Attorney is meeting with him at 10 am tomorrow. So this probably should be some time after that interview.

additional_notes: The document appears to be an email with redactions. The content is mostly legible, but some parts are blacked out.
